name: Incubus
description: An Incubus can shapeshift into an irresistibly attractive humanoid form, often using charm and illusion magic to seduce mortals.
memorable: They drain the life force of mortals and create chaos by turning them against each other.
goals: To seduce and manipulate mortals, feeding off their emotions and vitality.
relations: Typically works with others of its kind or other evil aligned fiends.
environment: Often found in dark, seductive environments or places of temptation.
strengths: Excels at deception and charm, making them skilled manipulators.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to nonmagical attacks and reliant on their charm ability.
attacks: Uses a draining kiss to inflict psychic damage and reduce the target's hit point maximum.
most_powerful_ability: Draining Kiss that causes significant psychic damage and reduces hit point maximum.
senses: Has passive Perception of 15, making it perceptive in social situations.
skills: Proficient in Deception and Persuasion, allowing for masterful manipulation and seduction.
additional_information: Can communicate telepathically with charmed creatures regardless of distance.
Has the ability to enter and exit the Ethereal Plane.
Resistant to cold, fire, lightning, and poison damage.
test_queries: seductive demon that drains life force
chaotic incubus that uses charm magic
male counterpart to succubus feeding on emotions
demonic creature that exists in both planes
